title: How to Become a Vampire in Oblivion for Xbox 360

methods.name: Killing Someone Non-Essential in the Game

steps.headline: Kill someone non-essential in the game.
steps.description: For example, a guard or a homeless person.

steps.headline: Sleep at an inn.
steps.description: If you have been seen while killing, there will be words at the top that say "Seen by an unknown force".

steps.headline: Wait to be visited by a dark brotherhood person.
steps.description: He will instruct you to kill a certain person. Kill the person requested, then slip back again in your hideout.

steps.headline: After you join the dark brotherhood, do quests till you get to rank 3.
steps.description: Then talk to him about the dark gift. He'll ask you to become a creature of the night.

steps.headline: Say yes, then you need to sleep that night.
steps.description: After waking up, wait for two days. Sleep one night to gain the vampire mode on the night of day two.

steps.headline: Do a quest that involves killing vampires.
Let them hit you a few times.
steps.description: Then fall back immediately when you see the words "Disease contracted porphyric hemophilia".

steps.headline: Go to an inn.
steps.description: Wait two days and sleep one night.

steps.headline: When you wake up on the night of day two you should be a vampire.

text: Killing Someone Non-Essential in the Game Kill someone non-essential in the game. For example, a guard or a homeless person. Sleep at an inn. If you have been seen while killing, there will be words at the top that say "Seen by an unknown force". Wait to be visited by a dark brotherhood person. He will instruct you to kill a certain person. Kill the person requested, then slip back again in your hideout. After you join the dark brotherhood, do quests till you get to rank 3. Then talk to him about the dark gift. He'll ask you to become a creature of the night. Say yes, then you need to sleep that night. After waking up, wait for two days. Sleep one night to gain the vampire mode on the night of day two. Enjoy your vampire mode!  Killing Vampires Do a quest that involves killing vampires.  Let them hit you a few times. Then fall back immediately when you see the words "Disease contracted porphyric hemophilia". Go to an inn. Wait two days and sleep one night. When you wake up on the night of day two you should be a vampire.  Enjoy your vampire mode!
